Task ID:
\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)Princess Moegi has really been down in the dumps
lately. I wonder if it's because she's worried
about her brother?\e

\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)Goodness me, why am I rattling on about to a
visitor from abroad who I've only met for the
first time. Please pay no attention.\c

\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)Is that right? Foreign ships have filled the
harbor… Oh dear. Now Princess Moegi has one
more thing to worry about.\e

\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)But its really not something that we commoners
should concern ourselves with, is it? I think
the princess will get through this just fine.\c

\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)Now the princess can finally begin thinking
about her own happiness. I'm really glad.\e

\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)It's good to see you again. How has Princess
Moegi been since we last met?\e

\h(《Cleaning Lady 》)Even though she has been away from us, we
Yafutomans have never stopped thinking about our
beloved princess.\c

\h(《Girl 》)You know, sir, my big sister spends all her time
worrying about how our princess is doing.\c

\h(《Girl 》)Did you know, sir? A foreign fleet has sailed
into the harbor. Maybe I'll go have a look.\c

\h(《Girl 》)Say, is it true the foreign fleet has gone home
already? I was planning to go have a look at it.\c

\h(《Girl 》)You know, sir, when I grow up, I think I want to
go sailing on a ship, too.\e

\h(《Girl 》)When Princess Moegi went abroad, she went on a
ship, right? I want to do the same thing.\c
\h(《Koketa》)Food! Food!\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Oh, you must be the westlanders they're all
talking about. I'm Kirala.
I'm the best carpenter in the country.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)So what do you think of our town?
I bet you don't see such fine structures in your
country.\e

\h(《Well…》)”You're right about that.”
”Nah, it's nothing special.”\e

\h(《Vyse 》)You're right about that. What a difference
between seeing something and only hearing about
it. You've really got a fine-looking town here.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Ha ha, do you really think so? Well, it sure
warms my heart to hear you say that.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Say! Maybe I should go back west with you and
visit your country.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)I could probably show you westlanders a thing or
two that would really amaze you.\e

\h(《Vyse 》)H, hey… What're you going to do about this
place then? It's still under construction!\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Ha ha, not to worry. This is my own house.
It was getting pretty old, so I decided to
remodel.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Well, then, it's decided.
I'll go back with you to your country and build
all sorts of things for you.\e
\h(　)Kirala has joined your crew as a ”Carpenter.”\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Incidentally, I have a little sister named
Urala.
You might want to give her a holler, too.\e

\h(《Vyse 》)Nah, it's nothing special. We've got plenty of
structures back home that look more impressive
than these.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)What?! You're telling me that the homes and
buildings you have back west are better than
mine?\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Hrumph! I can't let a remark like that go
unchallenged. I'm going to have to do something
about it.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)I say I should go back with you to your country
and build all sorts of things to show you just
what I can do.\e

\h(《Vyse 》)H, hey… What're you going to do about this
place then? It's still under construction!\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Ha ha, not to worry. This is my own house.
It was getting pretty old, so I decided to
remodel.\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Well, then, it's decided.
I'll go back with you to your country and build
all sorts of things for you.\e
\h(　)Kirala has joined your crew as a ”Carpenter.”\e

\h(《Kirala 》)Incidentally, I have a little sister named
Urala.
You might want to give her a holler, too.\e

\h(《ヴァイス》)おっ、カモの親子だ！
小ガモがちょこちょこ親の後を
ついてまわって、かわいいなあ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)カブを細長くしたような野菜が
干してある。ヤフトマーにも
こんな野菜があるんだな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)おっ、干し魚か。
うまそうだし
航海に持っていくにもいいな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)この木材の表面の滑らかさ……
よほどのベテラン職人が
カンナをかけたにちがいない。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ヤフトマーの字は
上から下に書くんだな。
どうやって読むんだろ？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ヤフトマーの酒かな？
空賊島の酒好き連中がいたら
すごく飲みたがるだろうな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)木の皮のような、太い枝のような
なんだこの植物は。
野菜……なのかな？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ティーセットが入ってるな。
ふうん、こっちのお茶の葉は
緑色なんだなあ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)うわ……なんだ、このツボは？
ドロみたいなものの中に
いろんな野菜が漬けられてるぞ！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)小ビンに小さなアメが
たくさん入っている。
なんか機雷みたいな形だな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ミソシルとかいうスープだな。
うーん……なんだか
ちょっと変わったにおいだ。\c
